title: Kan nghak reng che kan Lalber
author: Suakliana
lyrics:
Kan nghak reng che kan Lalber,
Khawvel hrehawm thim hnuaiah;
I buatsaih Salem khawpui, aw, ka ngai tawh mang e
Khawvel hrehawmna leh thim hnuaiah leng mah ila,
Hmangaiha min zawngtu chu ka ngaibang thei lo ve.

Van ropui, Eden th ar nuam chu,
Lungngaih awm tawh lohna hmun chu;
Aw engtik nge ka thlen ve ang,
I chatuan lalna ram, eng mawi nuam tak chu?

Lo hnai rawh, ka Chhandamtu,
Ral a lian khawvelah hian;
Thisena i tlan sate lungngaiin an tap e,
Khawvel i fan laia i thlaphanna Kalvari,
Hmelmate an lo kal e, i ram dotute chu.

Aw, khawiah nge Chhandamtu,
Zion tlang ralmuanna chu?
Sual tlenfaina hmangaih tui, kan tan i luanna chu,
Sual dan chahna kulhpui, i chatuan van khua leh tui,
Chhandam fa i zar mawia lawma an lenna chu.

Aw, khawvel hi a ral ang,
Rei lo tean a ral ang;
Chhandamtu a au vang a, lei ram kan pel tawh ang,
Krista hmangaihtuten Lal ropuina an chang ang,
Hmangaihna a fawn vel e, lawm r'u, Haleluia!
